name: suigym
description: Transform your fitness journey into an epic NFT quest on Sui blockchain

scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd backend && sui client switch --env testnet && sui client publish --gas-budget 100000000
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd backend && sui client switch --env mainnet && sui client publish --gas-budget 200000000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf build

author: SuiGym Team
